actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

Message on Senate action sent to the House.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands

official_title: A joint resolution approving the location of the Korean War Memorial.

summary.text: Approves of the location, in the area described in a specified Act as Area I in the District of the Columbia, of a commemorative work to honor members of the armed forces who served in the Korean War.

titles.title: A joint resolution approving the location of the Korean War Memorial.
